data.professional_summary: To work in a professionally managed corporate environment where I will have the opportunity for learning, growth and my competence will get the chance to change the productivity and effectiveness of the organization. Having 9.5 Years of IT Industry Experience. Hands on Experience in C#, ASP.Net , MVC5, Web API, WCF , Web Services,Azure. Hands on Experience in .Net Core 6.0 , Java Script , Jquery , Angular16 ,React.js,Redux . Hands on Experience in .NET( framework4.0,4.5,4.7). Hands on Experience in Ado.Net , Entity Framework Linq. Hands on Experience in SQL Server 2008, SQL Server 2012, SQL Server 2014,PostgreSQL. Hands on Experience in GIT, SVN, TFS. Hands on Experience in SignalR, RabbitMQ,Kafka, Google Map API, Payment Get-way. Hands on Experience in SQL-Query , Stored Procedure, Triggers, CTE , SQL Transaction. Good Knowledge in Bootstrap Framework , HTML, CSS. Good Knowledge in Microsoft Azure,Microservices. Having good exposure on building and deployment phase of the application. Ability to translate business requirement into conceptual solutions. Good client-interfacing Skills. Strong analytical abilities, good leadership qualities, good team management interpersonal skills and communication skills.
projects: Vision IOT: Duration: 32 months. Roles: Full Stack Developer. Environment: C#, .NET Core 6.0, MVC Framework, Web API, React.js, Redux, SQL Server, Azure function, Azure Blob Storage. Description: The World’s Most Customer-Centric IoT Platform for Retailers & CPG Brands. Unlock real-time, store-level product visibility to elevate retail execution. Effortlessly streamline and scale store audits, monitor planogram compliance, ensure accurate pricing—all in real-time. Our Clients: Coca-Cola, Unilever, Nestlé.

McDonald's Restaurant: Duration: 14 months. Roles: Full Stack Developer. Environment: C#, ASP.NET Core, Web API, Entity Framework, Angular16, RavenDB and used Design Patterns CQRS, Microservices. Description: McDonald’s is one of the most famous and largest fast-food restaurant chains in the world.

Prodigious ERP System: Duration: 25 months. Roles: Full Stack Developer. Environment: C#, ASP.NET MVC Framework, WCF, Ado.Net, JQuery, SQL Server 2012, Kafka. Description: Prodigious HRMS is a system designed to manage the entire range of activities performed by the HR department which includes appointment, appraisals, increments, transfers, leave and attendance, salary generation, TDS on salaries, employee separation etc. The system allows the creation of Organizational Hierarchies and depicts professional relationships among employees. This helps the user in Manpower Planning and Recruitment. HRMS allows managers to produce a vast array of statistical and analytical reports to assist them in managing their employees.

Traffic Congestion Monitoring System: Duration: 12 months. Roles: Full Stack Developer. Team: 4. Environment: C#, .NET Core 3.0, MVC Framework, Web API, Entity Framework, Linq, Angular8, PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ. Description: This Project have to monitor live Traffic Congestion all Toll Plaza of Reliance.

Reliance Roads Data Analytic: Duration: 15 months. Roles: Developer. Team: 6. Environment: C#, MVC5, Web API, Entity Framework, JQuery, Sql-Sever2012. Description: This Project have to manage all reliance toll plaza traffic and revenue.

Land Information Management System (NTPC): Duration: 18 months. Roles: Developer. Team: 6. Environment: C#, MVC5, Web API, Entity Framework, JQuery, Sql-Sever2012 Linq. Description: NTPC have Acquired Land for Col mining, this project is goal mange land Information.

Superbmytrip: Duration: 12 months. Roles: Developer. Team: 5. Environment: c#, Asp.Net, Ado.Net, Sql-Sever2008. Description: Book Domestic & International Flight Tickets and Hotels. SuperbMyTrip is one of the leading and most convenient domestic flights and International flight booking platforms. Link: http://superbmytrip.com/

DocOPD: Duration: 12 month. Roles: Developer. Team: 4. Environment: C#, Asp.Net, Ado.Net, Web services (Json Format), SQL-Sever2008. Description: DocOPD is working in wellness & curative space and committed towards better public health & reducing out of the pocket medical expenses. Link: https://docopd.com/
